channel.title: Comments on: Why I sometimes get miscellaneous exclamation marks (!) in SQL generated emails
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: I see makes sense in that case, glad you figured it out
item.content:encoded: I see makes sense in that case, glad you figured it out

item.title: By: kaht
item.dc:creator: kaht
item.content:encoded:
>>SP_OACREATE?? That is hardcore :-)…are you still on last century’s SQL Server? (2000)

For the specific thing I’m working on today, yes… üôÅ

>>BTW, why not
+ CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)

instead of

+ ‘
‘ + CHAR(10)

The specific task I was working on today involved creating an HTML table, so the br tag in the example was a byproduct of already working with the HTML tags.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
BTW, why not
+ CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)

instead of

+ ‘<br />’ + CHAR(10)
